channel.title: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS
channel.description: Quite straight up question. What would you pay/donate for to get in a RSPS? Just to get a general thought on how a proper donating reward system should be.

item.title: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

How about you let them willingly donate and not offer them property that isn’t yours

Read full topic
item.source: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS

item.title: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I quite like the donate for X amount of double xp time or vote for an xp boost rather than items etc.

Read full topic
item.source: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS

item.title: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

[quote=“eyeownyew, post:17, topic:508431”][quote author=u loose link=topic=626671.msg4261372#msg4261372 date=1363487760]
When I donate(which is rare) I want that money to go into the server, paying for vps, etc not to go into their pockets to spend on alcohol etc.

Things I’d donate for is.
Double xp ring.
Donator(depending on what it offers)
Extra bosses.
Rare items(not items like Santa etc that everyone has)
[/quote]
You must be twelve, because those are things that twelve year-olds aim to acquire by donating…[/quote]Well, the general public is around the age of 12-15, so it’s quite normal I guess.

I wish everyone would donate for better uptime of the server, but I don’t believe that that will work.

Thanks for many ideas though guys.

Read full topic
item.source: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS

item.title: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

People donate if you don’t bribe them, trust me. If they play a sustainable server that they find entertaining, they’ll donate (and I mean donate, not pay for shit).

Read full topic
item.source: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS

item.title: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:11, topic:508431”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=626671.msg4260897#msg4260897 date=1363450326]
Things not to offer:

[ul][li]Items only achievable by donating[/li]
[li]Items made easier to achieve by donating[/li]
[li]Faster XP rates[/li]
[li]Donator zones[/li]
[li]Crowns[/li]
[li]Colored yell titles[/li]
[li]The right to yell when others can’t[/li][/ul]

Things to offer:

[ul][li]99.9% uptime[/li]
[li]Guaranteed regular updates[/li]
[li]Teleport tabs[/li][/ul]

Donators should not be made to be higher than anyone else. Just because you have extra money in your pocket does not reserve the right for you to be spoiled.
[/quote][/quote]
I see no problem with yell titles or crowns, just a little cosmetic buff is all.

Read full topic
item.source: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS

item.title: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

[quote=“Flame_, post:3, topic:508431”]Things not to offer:

[ul][li]Items only achievable by donating[/li]
[li]Items made easier to achieve by donating[/li]
[li]Faster XP rates[/li]
[li]Donator zones[/li]
[li]Crowns[/li]
[li]Colored yell titles[/li]
[li]The right to yell when others can’t[/li][/ul]

Things to offer:

[ul][li]99.9% uptime[/li]
[li]Guaranteed regular updates[/li]
[li]Teleport tabs[/li][/ul]

Donators should not be made to be higher than anyone else. Just because you have extra money in your pocket does not reserve the right for you to be spoiled.[/quote]
This. But sadly, from experience, people don’t seem to donate unless they get something OP.

Read full topic

item.title: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“HcoJustin, post:8, topic:508431”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=626671.msg4261108#msg4261108 date=1363468846]

I always liked cosmetic items, items that had no stats but looked cool.

Exactly, but I don’t know how I’d feel on selling rares.
[/quote]
Then don’t make them tradeable so they don’t become rares? Or create your own cosmetic items for people to use?[/quote]
Well on the note of the second thing, customs should die. Customs in a server make me sick and I turn away instantly.
But yeah, removing trade would make them rares but I feel that it ruins the fun too.

Read full topic
item.source: What are things you would like to donate for in a RSPS

Things to offer:

Donators should not be made to be higher than anyone else. Just because you have extra money in your pocket does not reserve the right for you to be spoiled.
